media.alt: portrait of a man in a suit, with the text 'the amazing story of Psychiana' below
media.caption: Good News – Power (Radio Episode Excerpt)

text.headline: Good News – Power (Radio Episode Excerpt)
text.text: Example locally hosted audio item. A short excerpt from a Psychiana radio program episode that begins with assurance that there is a Power that can get people what they desire. Robinson then discusses his early life failures and childhood seeking of some force that could turn his failures into success. He asserts the God-Power can turn our failures into success and bring us material and spiritual abundance.

media.alt: grainy image from historic film depicting fans heading to football game

text.headline: University of Idaho vs. University of Southern California (Football), 10/30/1925
